website_summaries.verdict: A trio of candle holders that will look great in any room of your home.
pros: Ceramic base in white or grey suits classic and contemporary decor
cons: Hollow construction, so they aren't as sturdy as they look

customer_reviews.title: Cheap looking
customer_reviews.text: These are very bright white ... no touch of ivory or cream ... so I can't complain about the color. But they are extremely light, very shiny and cheap looking. Should have returned them but in the end decided to put them in our guest room on top of a wardrobe so they're not in your face (so to speak). From a distance they look okay.
customer_reviews.author: Kaz

customer_reviews.title: Happy with it.
customer_reviews.text: Got two sets of this one from another store. All wrapped properly and plan to use it for our advent candles with Christmas wreath this Christmas. True color, shiny white and bath and body 3 wick candles fit on ‘em so that’s extra points.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Serviano

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Great Quality!
customer_reviews.text: I usually don't leave comments but this candle holder set exceeded my expectations. They have a beautiful shape and it's such good quality! I've been searching for a nice, affordable white candle holder set and so happy I found this one!
customer_reviews.author: Pavel

customer_reviews.title: Lovely Candle holders
customer_reviews.text: Cute set of candle holders. Much nicer in person than in photo. Really great value.
customer_reviews.author: Leah

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed... These ceramic holders would have been perfect... But one is chipped and the tall one is so crooked I can’t use it at all. They are going back ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Rada

customer_reviews.title: Just as described
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, beautiful color, much more beautiful in real life
customer_reviews.author: Maria Valle

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful...they have a gloss finish so not antique looking...I’m not sure why there are bad reviews...the only problem I have is the smaller two are the same size but still not a big issue. Heavy and well made. Great value for the cost
customer_reviews.author: Charles Baugh

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and Well-Made
customer_reviews.text: I am redecorating my kitchen, dining room, and breakfast rooms and going with a white and black checkered theme with some pops of color. I bought these which candlesticks to hold black candles. Then I bought some black candlesticks to hold white candles. I saw these on Amazon and decided to try them! I’m so glad I did! They are nice quality and very pretty and well-made. They are ceramic, so know that they’d be best out of reach of children. I wish they came in more colors! I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amy W. Holcomb

customer_reviews.title: Good value and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. Came quickly and are just what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Erica H

customer_reviews.title: These are very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I like the way these are made and the size of all three of them. I will be able to use them throughout the entire year. A ribbon could be added to match the season these are being used.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: These are substantial and won't tip over easily. Easy to clean, also.
customer_reviews.author: Pearl B.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and buy
customer_reviews.text: These candlesticks look great on my white mantle, especially during the holidays. They are shiny and beautiful and look great and high quality.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly from Nashville

customer_reviews.title: They are GORGEOUS!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: Ceramic ✔ Weighted ✔ Good for orbs or candles ✔ GOOD FOR MY BUDGET!!! BANK ON IT!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Orchid-power

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These were perfect and very beautiful. They arrived very well packaged. I definitely recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: K. Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: White Candle Holders
customer_reviews.text: Love them! These candle holders really brightened up my table setting.
customer_reviews.author: Janie

customer_reviews.title: Decent but damaged
customer_reviews.text: I really like this set of pillar candle holders. They were just what I was looking for. I am disappointed they came damaged, but it isn’t worth the hassle of returning. I’m just going to have the chip in the one holder facing the wall so you cannot tell.
customer_reviews.author: Nick Zeletski

customer_reviews.title: A delicate touch
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased with these candle pillars was in the hunt for some just like these but they were so pricey, these are sturdy and beautifully made, look great with my farmhouse decor. Love them
customer_reviews.author: Milanne

customer_reviews.title: Great price for 3!
customer_reviews.text: I have candles for every holiday and these are perfect for my need! Used for Halloween, Thanksgiving, and Christmas!
customer_reviews.author: DIANNE ARCENEAUX

customer_reviews.title: Chipped
customer_reviews.text: The 9 1/2” pillar has a chip along the top rim. Looked through the packaging for the piece that chipped off, planning to glue it back on. It was not in the packing so apparently it was shipped that way. I’ll use it anyway with the chipped side to the back. Obviously cannot not gift it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty, aren’t heavy, and seem to be quality material. These are a great addition to my bathroom!
customer_reviews.author: Mrs D

customer_reviews.title: I love them!
customer_reviews.text: They were very well packaged when arrived. Nothing broken or dented. They are made well not heavy at all. Nice and steady. My red candles will look great on them.
customer_reviews.author: WhoMi876

customer_reviews.title: Loved all the sizes and color,
customer_reviews.text: These candle holders are an essential in decorating any room, any holiday
customer_reviews.author: Valerie

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my Christmas display
customer_reviews.text: Excellent price and great value. Perfect on my mantle with Christmas Candles
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!!
customer_reviews.text: These are so pretty! Great quality! I ended up using one of them for my pencil holder just to make it look a little more pretty :-)
customer_reviews.author: Courtney Reynoso

customer_reviews.title: Great Dining Center Piece
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful presentation on our dinning table - got two sets to vary the height of candles the whole length. Very happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and reasonable price white ceramic candle holders
customer_reviews.text: Very nice white ceramic candle holders. A great addition to my white ceramic Easter collection. I order a second set and the price is very reasonable.
customer_reviews.author: LINA MARIA OSORIO

customer_reviews.title: Pillar candle holder
customer_reviews.text: These are great for my xmas decor. and will be useful for my candles after xmas
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what is pictured! Great packaging kept them intact through delivery. The design makes them so sleek and stunning! Love love these!
customer_reviews.author: Jessie J.

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: These candle holders are exactly like the picture. The packaging was great and kept the product in good condition. They looked great on my dining table. I have no complaints!
customer_reviews.author: Goodies

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: These are very elegant and look more expensive than they are. Might buy another set!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: It's not heavy very light but right size
customer_reviews.text: VERY NICE big size for the table setting I Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cute and affordable
customer_reviews.text: I really liked them! They are a true white, pretty solid and the perfect size for my mantel.
customer_reviews.author: Alli

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: No complaints. Looks exactly as I was expecting. Not broken. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lopsided
customer_reviews.text: The large one is lopsided, but the 2 smaller ones are ok.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Morrow Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Nicer in person
customer_reviews.text: They came packaged well, so no damage. I love them, ordered a second set so I have 2 tall pillars! Much nicer in person than pictures shows. Highly Recommend
customer_reviews.author: Kate Hamill

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: These worked great in my spare Bathroom. They look very nice!
customer_reviews.author: J Walker

customer_reviews.title: Buy these!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful! They look much more expensive than they are. I am using them on my Christmas mantle now but plan on using them on the mantle year around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Angela

customer_reviews.title: Would recommend to a friend
customer_reviews.text: They are great for the price. No complaints at all.
customer_reviews.author: R CROOK

customer_reviews.title: Pretty & Practical
customer_reviews.text: These candle holders came exactly as pictured and look beautiful on my fireplace or as a table centerpiece. I would buy again !
customer_reviews.author: Jasna

customer_reviews.title: Very Nice Candlesticks
customer_reviews.text: These are great candlesticks! Very good value for the price paid. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Veebs

customer_reviews.title: I have Lennox vase and these look great with it!
customer_reviews.text: These three came package safely with no breakage. They are beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Myers

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: This was a great buy! They’re very sturdy and a great size.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: Fancy dog treat holders
customer_reviews.text: I wanted a way for my dogs treats to match my decor while keeping them convenient. I bought some glass containers but they were too flat. I bough these on a whim and they were perfect! I absolutely live how it looks.
customer_reviews.author: Kaity

customer_reviews.title: Love the look
customer_reviews.text: They are very light in weight Very pretty though I had purchased this set at Walmart originally and they fell off the mantle and shattered into dozens of pieces. I found them again on Amazon. Just need to be extra careful because they break easily
customer_reviews.author: Holly Noel

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These are not very well-made or packaged. They had little bumps that were baked into the ceramic. I kept them as they were only for the holidays but if I was going to use them every day I would absolutely return them
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: Love these candlesticks they are pretty and not plastic crap at all. They are a decent weight and go with my bedroom theme which is beach blue and white. They look awesome w my new candles. See pics.
customer_reviews.author: Amie

customer_reviews.title: Attractiveness, price
customer_reviews.text: These are very pretty. They do have a few flaws which can easily be hidden amongst the added greenery and vines of my display. Inspect closely though.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Candleholders!
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE these candleholders ! They are better than I expected for the price. I will order them later if they come in black! I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Shopping Grandma

customer_reviews.title: Very nice candle holders.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered many items from Hosley and never have been disappointed!. Couldn't believe I was getting 3 for this price.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love these. Pretty and light weight. Classic shape. EXACTLY what I was looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy L.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty
customer_reviews.text: I wish they were but as shiny but I knew what I was buying still very pretty
customer_reviews.author: carissa

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: These are so beautiful. They are even better than I expected. Very big, solid ceramic pieces. High quality. Just beautiful.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Allen

product_meta.title: Hosley Set of 3 Ceramic White Pillar Candle Holders Two 6 Inch and One 9.5 Inch High. Ideal for LED and Pillar Candles Gifts for Wedding Party Home Spa Reiki Aromatherapy Votive Candle Gardens P2
product_meta.description: Color:White| Size:6'' , 6'' & 9.5'' HighHosley's Set of 3 Ceramic White Pillar Candle Holders - Two 6" and One 9.5" High. Ideal for LED and Pillar Candles, Gifts for Wedding, Party, Home, Spa, Reiki, Aromatherapy, Votive Candle Gardens. Measurements: large holder 4.3" x 4.3" x 9.5" and small holders 4.5" x 4.5" x 6". For use with pillar candles. Candles not included.
feature_bullets: PRODUCT: Hosley's Ceramic White Pillar Candle Holders, Set of Three.
USE: Great for adding a decorative touch to any room's decor. Wonderful accent piece for coffee tables or side tables. Perfect for everyday use, wedding, events, aromatherapy,Spa, Reiki, Meditation.

BENEFITS: Great for the remembrance of the special occasion. It's perfect if you are looking for decorative accent. When using in your home as a decorative accent. For use with 3" x 3" pillar candles.
MEASUREMENTS/MATERIAL: Each one measureslarge holder 4.3" x 4.3" x 9.5" and small holders 4.5" x 4.5" x 6", white in color and made of ceramic.

HOSLEY BRAND PRODUCTS: Hosley brand products are made from quality raw materials with minimal wastage at every step of production. With the goal of achieving a neutral carbon footprint, please recycle and help leave Mother Earth better off for future generations.
